                    welcome to southwestern parts & service located at 605 west mockingbird in dallas, tx. we have over 35 years experience in fishing reel repair. our staff of 9 reel technicians are the most knowledgeable
    in the business. our service center carries one of the most extensive
    fishing reel parts inventory in the world. 
we have over 4,000 schematics online to help you find and order the exact part number needed to repair your reel. if you can't find the part you need, simply drop us a line and we will hook you up!
